Title: Weaponized Soul
Writer: Douglas Adams (based upon the novels by), Max Landis (created for television by), Max Landis
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Fiona Dourif
Plot: Flung backwards through time, Dirk and Todd make a horrifying discovery about the nature of their case, and find themselves with a unique opportunity: solve their case before it even starts.
